search_results.snippet:
This explorer turns up as a character in "A Night at the Chinese Opera". Marco 
Polo ..... A not very realistic Ceylon is the setting for Bizet's work about "fishers" for 
these gems ... She's a slave to Amneris, an Egyptian princess. Aida ...... Princess 
Ninetta is briefly transformed into a rat in "The Love for Three" of these citrus fruits
.
